DOC.brief_summary: Prospective clinical observational registry study include consecutive patient clinical sign symptom due in-stent restenosis ( ISR ) definite ( ARC criterion ) stent thrombosis ( ST ) . Study hypothesis : Initial Stent implantation quality ( due technique/problems ) possible major determinant ST ISR real life practice . Both early , late , late ST , ISR important factor long term outcome initial stent implantation . Primary objective : - To elucidate possible cause ( ) thrombosis restenosis stent implantation real life practice clinical , angiographic IVUS evaluation . Secondary objective : - To describe clinical manifestation [ stable angina pectoris ( AP ) , unstable AP , non-ST-elevation myocardial infarction ( NSTEMI ) , ST-elevation MI ] index event ( inclusion ) . - To describe characteristic patient , lesion procedure initial percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) . - To describe antithrombotic pharmacological therapy precede index event . - To describe clinical outcome ( death , MI , revascularization , CCS angina class ) follow treatment index event 12 month follow-up . - To describe safety IVUS procedure ( product procedural related complications/ malfunction ) .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Clinical Observational Registry Including Consecutive Patients With In-stent Restenosis Stent Thrombosis
DOC.detailed_description: Investigational site : 10-15 high volume Nordic PCI centre experience intravascular ultrasound ( IVUS ) . Patients : - All consecutive patient admit ischemic event due ST ( estimate number patient > 100 ) either BMS DES . - All consecutive patient symptom sign ischemia due in-stent restenosis DES ( target 200 patient ) respective BMS patient maximum 100 patient . Total number patient 400 . Control group 1 ) Lesions treat initial PCI , index lesion , use control lesion stent failure ; ST ISR ( IVUS finding ) . - The study patient compare matched population Westdenmark Heart Database compare patient characteristic clinical manifestation initial PCI find possible difference patient without stent failure Methods : Detailed description characteristic patient , lesion procedure index PCI . Thorough description antithrombotic pharmacological therapy index PCI index event . Quantitative coronary angiography ( QCA ) index lesion stent implantation index event . IVUS index lesion index event . Logistics A one year workload 10.000 PCI-patients 10-15 participating centre constitute population risk . With stent thrombosis ( definitive stent thrombosis ) rate 1,5 % clinical restenosis rate 4 % 150 patient stent thrombosis 400 patient restenosis twelve month period . With DES penetration rate 50 % 75 DES-treated patient experience stent thrombosis 200 patient restenosis . Ethical approval , data registration analysis The study approve ethical committee data management authority participate Nordic country . Data register dedicated case report form ( CRF ) . Continuous variable express mean value +SD discrete variable absolute value percentage . Clinical angiographic variable control index event group compare use Student 's t- chi-square test . Inclusion criterion Consecutive consent patient suspected coronary stent relate clinical event , admit one participate hospital : 1 . Typical symptom evidence myocardial ischemia ( stable AP , UAP/NSTEMI , STEMI ) 2 . Clinical suspicion ST base ARC criterion ( probable ST ) . ST verify coronary angiography . 3 . ISR result clinical symptoms/events ( angina pectoris , unstable angina , NSTEMI , STEMI , document myocardial ischemia ) . ISR verify coronary angiography . IVUS perform whenever feasible base patient 's clinical condition . If IVUS study perform , mention patient include initial registry ( evaluate feasibility IVUS real life ) , final analysis base data obtain patient IVUS study perform . Exclusion criterion : - Informed consent obtain . IVUS assessment IVUS perform whenever feasible base patient 's clinical condition primary treatment index lesion . If IVUS catheter advance , lesion may dilate 2 mm balloon . Mechanical pullback use ( pull-back speed 0.5 mm/sec ) . The IVUS examination store VHS CD send IVUS core lab . Odense University Hospital . All event ( technical problem clinical event ) possibly relate IVUS investigation register report follow standard complaint procedure process manufacturer . In addition , quarterly progress report ( include complaint ) provide financial support company . QCA The angiography obtain index lesion PCI-procedure use qualitative quantitative coronary angiography ( QCA ) assessment use computerize QCA system ( Medis , Leiden , Holland ) . At index event angiography , least two cine-runs PCI-procedure procedure angulation index-PCI procedure . The angiogram store CD send angiographic core laboratory , Skejby Sygehus , University Aarhus , Denmark . End point Primary : Angiographic IVUS finding : - procedure related finding inclusion - Tabulation classification IVUS angiographic outcome Secondary : - Clinical manifestation index event - IVUS procedure related event Compliance antithrombotic therapy - Outcome treatment ( SR ST ) 12 month follow-up : clinical status major cardiac event Safety report An appropriate safety plan establish initiating investigator . Relevant procedure , product study-related event report follow local regulation . Furthermore , procedural complication adverse event define principle investigator study team report study coordinator track . The coordinating center principle investigator review table listing adverse event study regular basis , analyze trend , report unexpected adverse device procedural event appropriate bodies/committees per local requirement on-going review study ensure patient safety . The coordinating center follow procedure document handle database reconciliation . Complaint report Device malfunction , device-related adverse event product nonconformity report appropriate manufacturer follow local product complaint procedure participate site ( ) . Complaints also report regulatory authority per local requirement
